verses.verse: And He <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> into a <S%G4864>synagogue;<s%> and a <S%G444>man<s%> was <S%G1563>there<s%> with a <S%G3583>withered<s%> <S%G5495>hand.<s%>
And they were <S%G3906>watching<s%> Him [to see] <S%G1487>if<s%> He would <S%G2323>heal<s%> him on the <S%G4521>Sabbath,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that they might <S%G2723>accuse<s%> Him.
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G444>man<s%> with the <S%G3584>withered<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> <S%G1453>"Rise<s%> and [come] <S%G1519>forward<s%><S%G3319>!<s%>"

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "Is it <S%G1832>lawful<s%> on the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> to <S%G2554>do<s%> <S%G2554>harm,<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> a <S%G5590>life<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%>?" But they <S%G4623>kept<s%> <S%G4623>silent.<s%>

And after <S%G4017>looking<s%> <S%G4017>around<s%> at them with <S%G3709>anger,<s%> <S%G4818>grieved<s%> at their <S%G4457>hardness<s%> of <S%G2588>heart,<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G1614>"Stretch<s%> out your <S%G5495>hand.<s%>" And he <S%G1614>stretched<s%> it out, and his <S%G5495>hand<s%> was <S%G600>restored.<s%>

And the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out and <S%G2117>immediately<s%> [began] <S%G1325>taking<s%> <S%G4824>counsel<s%> with the <S%G2265>Herodians<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> Him, [as to] <S%G3704>how<s%> they might <S%G622>destroy<s%> Him.

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G402>withdrew<s%> to the <S%G2281>sea<s%> with His <S%G3101>disciples;<s%> and a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> from <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> <S%G190>followed;<s%> and [also] from <S%G2453>Judea,<s%>

and from <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> and from <S%G2401>Idumea,<s%> and <S%G4008>beyond<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan,<s%> and the <S%G4012>vicinity<s%> of <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> and <S%G4605>Sidon,<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of <S%G3745>all<s%> that He was <S%G4160>doing<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> to Him.

And He <S%G3004>told<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> that a <S%G4142>boat<s%> should <S%G4342>stand<s%> <S%G4342>ready<s%> for Him <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that they might not <S%G2346>crowd<s%> Him;

for He had <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G4183>many,<s%> with the <S%G5620>result<s%> that <S%G3745>all<s%> those <S%G3745>who<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3148>afflictions<s%> <S%G1968>pressed<s%> <S%G1968>about<s%> Him in <S%G2443>order<s%> to <S%G681>touch<s%> Him.

And <S%G3752>whenever<s%> the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> <S%G2334>beheld<s%> Him, they would <S%G4363>fall<s%> <S%G4363>down<s%> <S%G4363>before<s%> Him and <S%G2896>cry<s%> out, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "You are the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God!<s%>"
And He <S%G4183>earnestly<s%> <S%G2008>warned<s%> them not to <S%G4160>make<s%> Him <S%G5318>known.<s%>
And He <S%G305>went<s%> up to the <S%G3735>mountain<s%> and <S%G4341>summoned<s%> those <S%G3739>whom<s%> He <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G2309>wanted,<s%> and they <S%G565>came<s%> to Him.
And He <S%G4160>appointed<s%> <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> that they might be with Him, and that He might <S%G649>send<s%> them out to <S%G2784>preach,<s%>
and to <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> to <S%G1544>cast<s%> out the <S%G1140>demons.<s%>
And He <S%G4160>appointed<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve:<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> (to whom He <S%G2007>gave<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%>),

and <S%G2385>James,<s%> the [son] of <S%G2199>Zebedee,<s%> and <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G80>brother<s%> of <S%G2385>James<s%> (to them He <S%G2007>gave<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G993>Boanerges,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1510>means,<s%> <S%G5207>"Sons<s%> of <S%G1027>Thunder<s%>");

and <S%G406>Andrew,<s%> and <S%G5376>Philip,<s%> and <S%G918>Bartholomew,<s%> and <S%G3102>Matthew,<s%> and <S%G2381>Thomas,<s%> and <S%G2385>James<s%> the [son] of <S%G256>Alphaeus,<s%> and <S%G2280>Thaddaeus,<s%> and <S%G4613>Simon<s%> the <S%G2581>Zealot;<s%>
and <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2469>Iscariot,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3860>betrayed<s%> Him.

And He <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3624>home,<s%> and the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G4905>gathered<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> to <S%G5620>such<s%> an <S%G5620>extent<s%> that they <S%G1410>could<s%> not <S%G3366>even<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> a <S%G740>meal.<s%>

And when His own people <S%G191>heard<s%> [of this,] they <S%G1831>went<s%> out to <S%G2902>take<s%> <S%G2902>custody<s%> of Him; for they were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "He has <S%G1839>lost<s%> His <S%G1839>senses.<s%>"

And the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> who <S%G2597>came<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "He is <S%G2192>possessed<s%> by <S%G954>Beelzebul,<s%>" and "He <S%G1544>casts<s%> out the <S%G1140>demons<s%> by the <S%G758>ruler<s%> of the <S%G1140>demons.<s%>"

And He <S%G4341>called<s%> them to Himself and began <S%G3004>speaking<s%> to them in <S%G3850>parables,<s%> <S%G4459>"How<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G4567>Satan<s%>?
"And <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G932>kingdom<s%> is <S%G3307>divided<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1438>itself,<s%> that <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2476>stand.<s%>
"And <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G3614>house<s%> is <S%G3307>divided<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1438>itself,<s%> that <S%G3614>house<s%> will not be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G2476>stand.<s%>

"And <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> has <S%G450>risen<s%> up <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> and is <S%G3307>divided,<s%> he <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2476>stand,<s%> but he is <S%G5056>finished!<s%>

"But <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> the <S%G2478>strong<s%> <S%G2478>man<s%>'s <S%G3614>house<s%> and <S%G1283>plunder<s%> his <S%G4632>property<s%> <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> he <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G1210>binds<s%> the <S%G2478>strong<s%> man, and <S%G5119>then<s%> he will <S%G1283>plunder<s%> his <S%G3614>house.<s%>

<S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G265>sins<s%> shall be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> and <S%G3745>whatever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> <S%G988>blasphemies<s%> they <S%G987>utter;<s%>

but <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G987>blasphemes<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3756>never<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G859>forgiveness,<s%> but is <S%G1777>guilty<s%> of an <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G265>sin<s%> " â€“
<S%G3754>because<s%> they were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "He <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit.<s%>"
And His <S%G3384>mother<s%> and His <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G2064>arrived,<s%> and <S%G4739>standing<s%> <S%G1854>outside<s%> they <S%G649>sent<s%> [word] to Him, and <S%G2564>called<s%> Him.

And a <S%G3793>multitude<s%> was <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G4012>around<s%> Him, and they <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> Your <S%G3384>mother<s%> and Your <S%G80>brothers<s%> are <S%G1854>outside<s%> <S%G2212>looking<s%> for You."
And <S%G611>answering<s%> them, He <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> are My <S%G3384>mother<s%> and My <S%G80>brothers<s%>?"

And <S%G4017>looking<s%> <S%G4017>about<s%> on <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G4012>around<s%> <S%G2945><s%> Him, He <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2396>"Behold,<s%> My <S%G3384>mother<s%> and My <S%G80>brothers!<s%>
"For <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G4160>does<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> he is My <S%G80>brother<s%> and <S%G79>sister<s%> and <S%G3384>mother<s%>."
